name: Raise A Scratch! Version 1.05 (Bank Nerf & Buff, More)
name_original: Raise A Scratch! Version 1.05 (Bank Nerf & Buff, More)
description:
Welcome to.. Raise A Scratch! This is based on the popular ROBLOX experience (darn you ROBLOX!) Raise A Floppa. Take care of him/her. Feed him/her, Buy things, Fight Bosses, Make friends (Beluga, Floppa, etc.) And so much more! Have fun! also click the milk to feed Scratch on mobile or smartphone. and comp lol

Version 1.05 Update Board

-------------------------------------------

Fixed a few bugs, added a few things, added new sounds, bank now gives 2x money when withdrawing, but you have to wait 3 seconds for money to drop in, added wind at sneakpeak backdrop. (not recording i promish!)
